sentences.en: A light pointer is often useful with a slide projector.
sentences.cn: 光指示器经常与幻灯片放映机一起使用.

sentences.en: As such, Station is the largest gravity well projector on record.
sentences.cn: 于是, 重力中心站成为了有史以来最大的重力势阱发生器.

sentences.en: CASIO's innovative mobile styling has resulted in an A 4 - size projector with high - brightness .
sentences.cn: 卡西欧的创新移动造型的结果是A4大小的投影机具有 高亮度.

sentences.en: I examined three key technical properties of this proposed concave - mirror projector.
sentences.cn: 我检验了凹面镜投射的三项关键技术特性.

sentences.en: I'm impressed with all the equipment the projector has.
sentences.cn: 我对放映机中的所有装置印象都很深.

sentences.en: No later than 1890, he combined his moving - picture projector with his talking machine.
sentences.cn: 不迟于1890年, 他就把他的电影放映机和他的会说话的机器结合起来.

sentences.en: Our host ran a long extension cord out from the house and set up a screen and a projector.
sentences.cn: 我们的主人从房里牵出一根延长电线，架起屏幕和投影仪。

sentences.en: Our movie projector is of top quality and few other brands can compare with ours.
sentences.cn: 我们的电影放映机质量优异,其他的品牌很少能与我们的相比.

sentences.en: Place one of the negative records in the projector object plane.
sentences.cn: 将负片记录之一放入投影器的物平面内.

sentences.en: The film is run through a projector.
The phototube, a very special type of electron tube, is the heart of the talking - picture projector.
sentences.cn: 光电管, 一种非常特殊的电子管, 是有声电影放映机的心脏.

sentences.en: There is a new projector in my office.
sentences.cn: 我的办公室里有一架新的幻灯机.

sentences.en: Where would you find a projector for an 8 mm film these days?
sentences.cn: 你现在还能找到8毫米电影的投影机 吗 ?

sentences.en: With the removal of the projector, the Paradise system fell apart.
sentences.cn: 发生器被移走后, 天堂星系解体了.

sentences.en: You gave me back the projector.

trans.tran_cn: 放映机，幻灯机，投影仪，设计者，放映技师
trans.tran_en: a piece of equipment that makes a film or picture appear on a screen or flat surface
